headline.print_headline: 5-Year Term  In Deadly Blast At Water Park
headline.main: Taiwan Party Organizer Sentenced to Nearly 5 Years in Water Park Fire

snippet: Fifteen people were killed and hundreds badly injured in June after flammable color powder ignited at the party, causing an explosion.
lead_paragraph: Fifteen people were killed and hundreds badly injured in June after flammable color powder ignited at the party, causing an explosion.
